Text: How is the knowledge base populated? Choose the right answer.

Answers.Text: The problem application plugin has a workaround feature.
You can develop a business rule that generates a news item.

wpProQuiz_correct: Correct Option:

Text: Which of the following statements is true when a new table is created by extending another table ?

Answers.Text: The new table inherits all of the fields, but does not inherit Access Control rules, Client Scripts, and UI Policies of the parent table
The new table archives the parent table and assumed its roles in the database
The new table inherits all of the fields of the parent table and can also contain new fields unique to itself
The new table inherits all of the Business Rules, Client Scripts, and UI Policies of the parent table, but none of the existing fields

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is C. The new table inherits all of the fields of the parent table and can also contain new fields unique to itself.

Text: A. What are the main components of the Service Now graphical user interface (GUI) ?

Answers.Text: Application Navigator, Banner, Power Edge and Content Frame.
Application List, Report Gauge frame, Power Bar and Details pane
Application Navigator, News Content Frame, List pane and Information Structure.
Navigation Bar, Report Gauge frame, Power Bar and News Content Block.

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is A. Application Navigator, Banner, Power Edge and Content Frame.

Text: Links, buttons, context menu action belongs to ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is C. UI action.

Text: LDAP comes auto configured with company ServiceNow vendor instance
wpProQuiz_correct: FALSE.

Text: Which statement of the following is correct when referring to UI actions ?

Answers.Text: UI Actions cannot use scripts or be scripted.
UI actions are only executed on the server.
UI Actions on the task table are not available to its extended tables.
Conditions can be specified to determine when a UI Action appears.

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is D. Conditions can be specified to determine when a UI Action appears.

Text: Which is true regarding Knowledge Base?

Answers.Text: In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to categories.
In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to users.

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is A. In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to categories.

Text: Can we draw multiple transition from a single activity in workflow ?
wpProQuiz_correct: TRUE.

Text: Choose the table name where business rule information is stored in a ServiceNow instance .
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is B. "sys_script" table.

Text: Fill in the blank: _____ is any content created using the ServiceNow knowledge base.
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is D. Article.

Text: List the different type of table relationships
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct options are:

Text: How do you edit/ create a workflow ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is C. Graphical Workflow Editor.

Text: Applications and modules are loaded based on ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is B. roles.

Text: Which of the following is true while solving incidents as per ITIL framework ?

Answers.Text: Incident Priority is filled by the user.
Incident Impact is calculated on the basis of Urgency & Priority.
Incident Priority is calculated on the basis of Impact & Urgency.
Incident Urgency is based on Impact & Priority.

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is C. Incident Priority is calculated on the basis of Impact & Urgency.

Text: Choose any 3 ways from the below to update CMDB in a ServiceNow instance ?
wpProQuiz_correct: A. Correct: CMDB data can be manually entered into the ServiceNow instance by authorized users.

Text: Knowledge process consists of which of the following ?

Answers.Text: document creation, approval and review from SMEs and publishing

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is B. document creation, approval and review from SMEs and publishing.

Text: What are the main tools you can use to automate ServiceNow ?

Answers.Text: Lists, global text search, navigation filter, live feed

wpProQuiz_correct: TRUE.

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is D. Dashboards.

Text: When you open a service catalog and click the Order button what gets created first ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is D. REQ.

Text: Which of the components are visible on Workflow welcome screen ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is B. New Workflow Button.

Text: Which one of the below is used to group related fields together ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is A. Sections.

Text: Incident extends which table ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is A. task table.

wpProQuiz_correct: FALSE.

Text: Which tables are not part of base ServiceNow instance ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is B. custom tables.

Text: On ServiceNow instance, where can you view information about the system activity ?
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is A. System logs.

Text: Choose all the possible way by which events can be created on a ServiceNow instance.
wpProQuiz_correct: A. Correct: Business rules can be configured to create events under certain conditions, such as when a record is created, updated, or deleted.

Text: If the system administrator wants to modify the homepage, which of the following links on the page indicates that this can be done ?

Text: What Details does a knowledge article hold ?

Answers.Text: Known errors , User Solutions , Troubleshooting tips
Known errors , User Solutions , Troubleshooting tips , User information

Answers.Text: After it is set to public
